levels.name: Conservative
levels.instruction: Maintain exact visual layout and structure of the template. Focus only on optimizing the copy while preserving all design elements, images, spacing, and formatting. You may adjust wording for clarity and accuracy, correct grammatical issues, and ensure consistent terminology. Do not add or remove sections, images, change formatting, or alter any visual elements.

levels.name: Balanced
levels.instruction: Use the template as a foundation while implementing significant visual and content improvements. Enhance the design by incorporating: 1) Strategic use of color for emphasis and hierarchy, 2) Appropriate emojis to increase engagement, 3) Visual callouts or alert boxes for key information, 4) Custom formatting for quotes or testimonials, 5) Thoughtful use of bold and italic text for emphasis. The layout should be optimized for both desktop and mobile viewing. Core sections can be restructured for better flow and visual appeal. You must maintain professional standards while creating a visually engaging experience. Every enhancement should serve a clear purpose in improving communication effectiveness.

levels.name: Innovative
levels.instruction: Create a premium, highly polished email experience with sophisticated design elements. You have complete creative freedom to implement: 1) Custom color schemes that enhance brand identity, 2) Advanced visual hierarchies using size, color, and spacing, 3) Creative use of emojis, icons, and visual elements to enhance engagement, 4) Dynamic content blocks with clear visual separation, 5) Attention-grabbing headers and subheaders, 6) Custom-styled CTAs and action items, 7) Innovative formatting for key statistics or metrics, 8) Strategic use of whitespace for visual impact. The final product must be visually striking while maintaining utmost professionalism. Every design choice should enhance readability and engagement while creating a memorable, premium feel. The email should stand out as a high-end communication piece that reflects excellence in both content and design.
